categories: Category:Solo: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Michael Kenneth Williams (born November 22, 1966) is an American actor, dancer and reporter who was set to appear as Dryden Vos in Solo: A Star Wars Story, set in the Star Wars Anthology Series. He was cut from the film after he was unable to return for reshoots prompted by Phil Lord and Christopher Miller's replacement by Ron Howard and his role was recast with Paul Bettany.
